column1: Traffic reports will resume Friday December 15 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NICHOLASVILLE RD / SERIOUS COLLISION:
column4: Serious collision on Nicholasville Rd at Rosemont Garden reportedl involving a pedestrian.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NICHOLASVILLE RD / SERIOUS COLLISION:
column4: All inbound lanes are shut down at Jesselin Dr.  Traffic diverted to either Southland Dr or Jesselin Dr.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NICHOLASVILLE RD / SERIOUS COLLISION:
column4: Outbound Nicholasville Rd is down to one lane at Rosemont Garden.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NICHOLASVILLE RD / SERIOUS COLLISION:
column4: Motorists should avoid this area if possible and take an alternate route.
